item.title: Duterte says he's to blame for vaccine lack in early 2021
item.description: "Kung mayroon mang nagkasala diyan, aaminin ko na lang kasi wala rin naman akong magawa. Gusto kong bumili, wala naman akong mabilhan," Duterte said. "Kung makipag-contest ako doon sa mga mayaman na bilihan ng bakuna eh talagang huli ako," he added.

item.title: No waning effect seen in vaccines yet --Domingo
item.description: "At this time, wala pa pong pangangailangan na magbigay ng booster dahil hindi pa tayo nakakakita ng waning effect noong vaccine," Domingo said. Domingo said the FDA reported 516 breakthrough infections among fully vaccinated individuals nationwide, representing only 0.0025% of the 20.3 million fully vaccinated in the country.

item.title: VP Robredo sets up teams to assist Maring victims in Luzon
item.description: Vice President Leni Robredo has organized two teams to extend assistance to residents affected by Severe Tropical Storm Maring.

item.title: Oxygen hubs eyed in all regions amid COVID-19 pandemic, says Lorenzana
item.description: The national government will put up across the country oxygen command centers to address the increasing demand for medical oxygen amid the COVID-19 pandemic, National Task Force against COVID-19 chairmanDelfin Lorenzana said Monday.

item.title: Batches 3, 4 of SRA disbursed to health workers total P617.2M --Duque
item.description: The Department of Health has distributed P617.2 million in special risk allowances to health workers, up from P536.74 million last week, Health Secretary Francisco Duque III said Monday.Â

item.title: RepLeksiyon: Ang pagsisikap at pagtitiyaga ay may magandang bunga
item.description: Kung nais natin maglingkod, kailangan natin ipakita na karapat-dapat tayo (Marcos: 10:35-45).

item.title: Babaeng rider na walang lisensiya, hinalay umano ng pulis na sumita sa kaniya
item.description: Sinampahan ng reklamong panghahalay ng isang 26-anyos na babae ang isang pulis sa Pampanga. Ang suspek, naunang sinita ang biktima dahil sa pagmamaneho ng motorsiklo nang walang dalang lisensiya.

item.title: Thailand to re-open to vaccinated tourists on November 1 --PM
item.description: Thailand plans to fully re-open to vaccinated tourists traveling by air from countries deemed low risk from November 1, Premier Prayut Chan-O-Cha said Monday.

item.title: China says it carried out beach landing drills in province opposite Taiwan
item.description: China's military said on Monday it had carried out beach landing and assault drills in the province directly across the sea from Taiwan, though it did not link the exercises to current tensions with Taipei.

item.title: UP Diliman grad tops 2021 Chemical Engineering Licensure Exams
item.description: xxxA graduate from the University of the Philippines Diliman campus topped the October 2021 Chemical Engineer Licensure Examinations, the Professional Regulation Commission (PRC) announced Monday evening.

item.title: Power outage hits PGH on Monday night
item.description: According to a report on Super Radyo dzBB, some patients had to be transferred to other hospitals because the PGH's generator sets were not working.

item.title: Philippines receives 272,610 more Pfizer-BioNTech doses
item.description: The Philippines on Monday received 272,610 additional shots of the Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 vaccine, procured by the national government.

item.title: WHO experts recommend third dose for over-60s jabbed with Sinopharm, Sinovac
item.description: The WHO's vaccine advisors recommended Monday that people over 60 who have been fully immunized with China's Sinovac and Sinopharm vaccine should be offered a third Covid-19 vaccine dose.

item.title: WHO experts recommend extra COVID-19 jab for immunocompromised
item.description: The World Health Organization's vaccine advisory group on Monday recommended immunocompromised people should have an additional dose of all COVID-19 vaccines authorized by the WHO.

item.title: Mga pulis at humabol at nagpaputok ng baril kay Jake Cuenca, inalis sa puwesto
item.description: Kasabay ng pagsasampa ng reklamo ng pulisya laban kay Jake Cuenca, inalis naman sa puwesto ang limang pulis na humabol at nagpaputok ng baril sa aktor na may isang sibilyan ang tinamaan.
